d: A FreeSewing pattern that needs a description

bustSpanEase.d: Controls the amount of ease along the bust span

chestEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at the chest

shoulderToShoulderEase.d: Controls the amount of ease along the shoulder to shoulder measurement

fullChestEaseReduction.d: Allows you to independently reduce the ease around the chest to make it fit tight(er) in that area

waistEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at the waist

frontShoulderWidth.d: Controls how much width is added to the shoulder in the front

highBustWidth.d: Controls the width of the high bust

armholeDepth.d: Controls how deep the armhole is

cutDepthBack.t: Depth of the cut in the back
cutDepthBack.d: Controls the depth of the cut in the back

cutDepthFront.t: Depth of the cut in the front
cutDepthFront.d: Controls the depth of the cut in the front

cutRoundnessBack.t: Roundness of the cut in the back
cutRoundnessBack.d: Controls how 'round' the cut in the back is, from V to round to square

cutRoundnessFront.t: Roundness of the cut in the front
cutRoundnessFront.d: Controls how 'round' the cut in the front is, from V to round to square

shoulderDartPosition.d: Controls the position of the shoulder dart

strapWidth.d: Controls the width of the straps

upperDartLength.d: Controls the length of the upper dart

waistDartLength.d: Controls the length of the waist dart

zipperLocation.d: The location of the zipper: side, back, or front

zipperLocation.front.d: The location of the zipper will be in the front

zipperLocation.side.d: The location of the zipper will be on the side

zipperLocation.back.d: The location of the zipper will be in the back

lacing.d: This removes part of the seam to create an opening for lacing

lacingYes.d: Remove part of the seam to create an opening for lacing

lacingLocation.d: Lacing in the front, or the back

peplumYes.d: This will generate the peplum part.

peplumNo.d: Pattern will be generated without a peplum

peplumSize.d: Controls the size of the peplum

peplumFullness.d: Controls the 'fullness' of the peplum. Basically from a half-circle to a full-circle.
